main.title: Hello, I’m Felipe Gibran
main.body: Senior Fullstack Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable, production-ready web applications.

illuvium.title: Illuvium
illuvium.desc:
**Illuvium** is a large-scale **blockchain-based gaming ecosystem** that combines **AAA-quality game design** with **Web3 technology**, enabling true digital ownership through **NFT-based in-game assets**.

I have been working at **Illuvium** since **2022**, contributing as a **Frontend Engineer** to multiple core products within a large-scale **Web3 gaming ecosystem**.

My work spans **complex, production-grade applications** including marketplaces, gameplay-related web experiences, **design systems**, **authentication libraries**, and **content platforms**, all tightly integrated with **blockchain infrastructure** and **NFT-based assets**.

simpli.title: Simpli
simpli.desc:
I worked at **Simpli** from **2016 to 2021**, a **software house** specialized in building **digital products from the ground up** for a diverse range of clients.

During this period, I contributed to multiple end-to-end projects—from concept and MVP to production—working on products such as **Apptite**, **iTrack**, **Sharity**, and **WOW Talent**, collaborating closely with clients to translate business needs into scalable technical solutions.

Simpli also maintained a strong relationship with the **Neo blockchain ecosystem**, providing exposure to **Web3 concepts**, decentralized applications, and blockchain-driven product development early in my career.

about_me.title: Who I am
about_me.body:
I am a fullstack web software engineer focused on Frontend with over 10 years of experience delivering digital products that balance business goals, user needs, and technical excellence. I work closely with stakeholders to transform ideas into reliable, scalable applications, making informed technical decisions that support growth, performance, and long-term sustainability.

My approach focuses on building products that are easy to evolve, cost-efficient to operate, and intuitive for users, while maintaining high standards of quality, security, and performance. The result is software that not only works well, but also creates real value for the business behind it.

design-system.title: Design System Library - Version 2
design-system.desc:
**Design System Library — Version 2** is a more advanced and refined evolution of the original Illuvium web design system.
This version expanded and matured the foundations established in Version 1, introducing a richer component set, improved theming, and stronger consistency across products.
The system was fully integrated with **Chakra UI v3**, leveraging its modern styling architecture to enhance scalability, maintainability, and developer experience while preserving a distinct visual identity for Illuvium’s web ecosystem.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2025

illuvium-portal.title: Illuvium Portal News
illuvium-portal.desc:
**Illuvium Portal News** is the official web news platform for the Illuvium ecosystem, designed to centralize announcements, updates, and editorial content.
The project focuses on performance, SEO, and content scalability, delivering a polished reading experience while supporting a high-volume publishing workflow and seamless integration with Illuvium’s broader web presence.
It was built using **Payload CMS**, a headless, code-first content management framework where content models, access control, and business logic are defined directly in code, enabling high flexibility, strong typing, and deep customization while exposing content through APIs for modern web applications.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2025

overworld.title: Illuvium Overworld Web
overworld.desc:
**Illuvium Overworld Web** is a web experience designed to simulate the hunting of monsters (Illuvials) within the Illuvium universe.
The application reproduces the core gameplay loop where a drone captures discovered Illuvials and delivers them as NFTs, combining interactive mechanics, real-time feedback, and tight integration with the blockchain-backed asset system.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2024

illuvidex.title: IlluviDex Marketplace
illuvidex.desc:
**IlluviDex Marketplace** is a web-based marketplace that enables a free and open market for Illuvium game NFTs.
The platform connects in-game assets to the web, allowing players to browse, trade, and interact with NFTs in a decentralized marketplace environment, with a strong focus on usability, performance, and seamless wallet integration.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2024

account-web.title: Illuvium Login System Library - Version 1
account-web.desc:
**Illuvium Login System Library** is a core authentication library responsible for managing Illuvium’s login flows across its web ecosystem.
The library supports multiple authentication methods, including traditional email and password as well as blockchain-based login via cryptocurrency wallets such as MetaMask, providing a secure, flexible, and unified authentication experience.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2023

load-d1sk.title: Illuvium Beyond D1SK Web
load-d1sk.desc:
**Illuvium Beyond D1SK Web** is a mini-application within the Illuvium ecosystem designed for opening purchased Disks that contain collectible card NFTs.
The app provides an interactive and engaging experience where players reveal NFT assets that can be used both in-game and across Illuvium web platforms, emphasizing smooth animations, responsiveness, and seamless integration with the broader ecosystem.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2023

design-legacy.title: Illuvium Design System Library - Version 1
design-legacy.desc:
**Illuvium Design System Library** is the foundational design system created for Illuvium’s web products.
The project began with a comprehensive mapping of existing design assets and content produced by the Illuvium design team, followed by the organization, standardization, and formalization of these elements into a cohesive system.
Built from the ground up, the design system established a clear visual language and component structure, ensuring consistency, scalability, and a distinct identity for the web ecosystem.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2022

staking-app.title: Illuvium Staking App - Version 2
staking-app.desc:
**Illuvium Staking App** is a redesigned and expanded staking platform built to support Illuvium’s evolving tokenomics and user base.
The application focuses on clarity, performance, and scalability, providing users with a streamlined experience to stake assets, track rewards, and interact confidently with on-chain data through a polished and responsive interface.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2022

ndapp.title: NDapp
ndapp.desc:
**NDapp** is an information platform focused on aggregating news, insights, and data about decentralized applications built on the Neo blockchain.
The project provides a centralized hub for discovering and understanding the latest developments in the Neo ecosystem, emphasizing clarity, accessibility, and up-to-date technical information.

**Role:** Fullstack Developer
**Year:** 2021

wow.title: WOW Talent
wow.desc:
**WOW Talent** is a digital platform that showcases WOW Ambassadors—young professionals who have already built impactful careers and serve as references for emerging talent.
The experience highlights personal journeys, achievements, and professional insights, encouraging new talents to learn, connect, and become part of a growing community.

**Role:** Fullstack Developer
**Year:** 2021

apptite.title: Apptite Web
apptite.desc:
**Apptite Web** is a food delivery platform that connects independent chefs with customers seeking handcrafted, homemade meals.
The web application enables users to discover chefs, explore menus, and order lunch boxes in São Paulo, focusing on a seamless ordering experience and clear presentation of culinary offerings.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2020

sharity.title: Sharity
sharity.desc:
**Sharity** is an online crowdfunding platform designed to make creating campaigns and raising funds for meaningful causes simple, fast, and accessible.
The platform focuses on usability, transparency, and efficient donation flows, enabling individuals and organizations to connect with supporters and mobilize resources for the causes and people they care about.

**Role:** Fullstack Developer
**Year:** 2019

itrack.title: iTrack
itrack.desc:
**iTrack** is a delivery monitoring, verification, and management platform designed to provide full end-to-end visibility, from dispatch to last-mile delivery, all in the palm of your hand.
The system focuses on real-time tracking, operational transparency, and efficient logistics management, enabling better decision-making and improved delivery performance.

**Role:** Fullstack Developer
**Year:** 2018

illsim.title: Illness Simulator
illsim.desc:
**Illness Simulator (Illsim)** is an academic project developed in 2017 focused on modeling and analyzing the spread of a virus within a population.
The project simulates infection dynamics over time and evaluates different vaccination strategies to understand their effectiveness in containing outbreaks and reducing overall impact.
The study emphasizes data-driven experimentation, allowing scenarios to be adjusted to observe how variables such as infection rate, population size, and vaccination coverage influence the spread of the disease.

**Role:** Frontend Developer
**Year:** 2017
